title: HELP Stuck in a Custom Bot Game
body:
Created a custom game against bots and I left the game and when I got back to the client window I get the message of "You have left a game in progress, please reconect etc..."

 It was a game against bots so it should just cancel the game when I leave it right? It's not giving me any option other than reconnecting, and when I tried to reconnect I just get a black screen while it tries to load and then a message saying it can't connect to it, 
Only chat working.


 I've tried closing and restarting the client, and I've tried restarting my computer with no success so I'm kind of at a loss as to what I should do.

replies.body:
Ok after 2 hours i got a message saying
the game you are trying is no longer in progress .
Press Ok to continue.

and it returned to normal.

those who are having similar problem i found this on na forum



ere is the reply from support:

Greetings DragoRoyal,

I'm sorry to hear that you were stuck in a completed game. It sounds like you experienced what we refer to as a ghost game. This happens when the game server you were playing on fails to communicate the game-end message to PVP.Net.

The ghost game will last a maximum of 2 hours after this occurs. It often ends much earlier because the game server is simply backed up. Sometimes this issue can be fixed by relogging into League of Legends. Occasionally, restarting your computer may help. These actions force the client to request a new update.

Another side effect of the Ghost game is a delay with receiving your Influence Points, Experience or League Points. Once the game "clears" the server, these values will be updated on your account accordingly.

If the issue persists or occurs frequently, it may indicate a problem with your connection. If this is the case, I would be more than happy to help you find the cause. If it was just this a one-time occurrence, it was likely due to a delay in our server.

I am sorry for the inconvenience. Let me know if you have any questions.
